Although the passenger departure tax in Bermuda is levied to the owner of Airline for every departing passenger , this is squarely passed on to the passenger as part of the overall ticket fare . There are exceptions in case of children under 2 years , transit passengers and in some other cases . A tax of $ 35 is charged for every departing passenger . Also a Yacht arrival Tax in Bermuda is charged to the owner of the arriving yacht . Presently $ 35 is charged for each passenger arriving by the yacht
